ground_truth: Great waves of people kneeling are observed, and Buttercup, terribly moved, stands immobile among her subjects, blinking back tears as her beauty is held on for a moment. Buttercup barrels along, controlling her horse easily through a lovely, quiet, deserted area, but suddenly reins in as she encounters three men standing close together in the path, beyond whom can be seen the waters of Florin Channel. The three men are not your everyday commuter types; standing in front is a tiny man with the most angelic face, he is Sicilian, and his name is Vizzini. Beside him is a Spaniard, erect and taut as a blade of steel, and beside him is a giant. As she starts to fall, a sailboat is moored, and it's dusk now, with shadows long, as Inigo, the Spaniard, busies himself getting the boat ready, while the giant Fezzik carries Buttercup, unconscious, on board. Vizzini rips some tiny pieces of fabric from an army jacket and tucks them along the saddle of Buttercup's horse, and there is about the entire operation a sense of tremendous skill and precision as the horse takes off and they start for the boat. Vizzini hops onto the boat, in a fury, as Inigo and Fezzik stand as Vizzini advances on them and then glares at him, turns, and leaves them. During this, Inigo has gone close to Fezzik, who is very distressed at the insults he's just received. As they sail off, their voices are heard as the boat recedes; Inigo is at the helm, Fezzik stands near the body of the princess, whose eyelids flutter slightly—or do they? Vizzini sits motionless as the waves are higher, and there are only occasional flashes of moon slanting down between clouds. Inigo nods, glancing back as Vizzini turns a cold eye on the Princess and keeps staring behind them. Suddenly the three whirl and stare back, and as they do, it's hard to see; the moon is behind clouds now, but the wind whistles and the waves pound, and suddenly it's all gone ominous. Inigo, Fezzik, and Vizzini squint back, trying desperately to see, and at this moment, they are all holding their breaths. Then, the moon slips through, and Inigo was right—something is very much there—a sailboat. It's a good distance behind them but coming fast, closing the gap, as they stare at the other boat. Buttercup dives into the water, starting to swim away, and Vizzini screams as Buttercup, still close to the boat, switches from a crawl to a silent breaststroke. The wind dies, and as it does, something new is heard; Buttercup stops suddenly and treads water, still not far from the boat, staying silent, and she's gutsy. Behind her now, something dark and gigantic slithers past, and though she's scared, petrified—who wouldn't be—she makes no reply, and now a shrieking eel has zeroed in on her, and she sees it a short distance away, circling, starting to close. Buttercup is frozen, trying not to make a movement of any kind as the eel slithers closer and closer, and Buttercup knows now there's nothing she can do, it's over, all over, and now the eel opens its mouth wide, making a noise it's never made before, as its great jaws are about to clamp down.

test_cases.description:

Significant surges of individuals bowing are noted, and Buttercup, dreadfully affected, remains still among her followers, blinking back weeping as her loveliness is maintained for a moment. Buttercup charges along, managing her steed effortlessly through a charming, tranquil, uninhabited locale, but abruptly halts as she confronts three men situated close together in the route, beyond whom can be observed the waters of Florin Strait. The three men are not your everyday traveler sorts; positioned in front is a diminutive man with the most cherubic countenance, he is Sicilian, and his designation is Vizzini. Next to him is a Spaniard, upright and firm as a sword of metal, and next to him is a giant. As she begins to descend, a yacht is anchored, and it's twilight now, with shadows elongated, as Inigo, the Spaniard, occupies himself preparing the vessel, while the giant Fezzik transports Buttercup, insensible, aboard. Vizzini tears some small fragments of cloth from a military coat and tucks them along the saddle of Buttercup's steed, and there is about the entire maneuver a sense of immense expertise and accuracy as the horse departs and they commence for the vessel. Vizzini leaps onto the yacht, in a rage, as Inigo and Fezzik stand as Vizzini approaches them and then scowls at him, turns, and departs from them. During this, Inigo has approached close to Fezzik, who is very upset at the affronts he's just encountered. As they sail away, their tones are perceived as the boat retreats; Inigo is at the wheel, Fezzik stands near the form of the princess, whose eyelids quiver slightly—or do they? Vizzini remains immobile as the billows are taller, and there are only infrequent glimpses of moonbeam angling down between clouds. Inigo inclines, looking back as Vizzini turns a frigid gaze on the Princess and continues peering behind them. Suddenly the three twirl and gaze back, and as they do, it's difficult to see; the moon is behind clouds now, but the breeze whistles and the billows crash, and suddenly it's all become menacing. Inigo, Fezzik, and Vizzini squint back, attempting frantically to see, and at this juncture, they are all holding their breaths. Then, the moon slides through, and Inigo was correct—something is very much there—a sailboat. It's a significant distance behind them but approaching swiftly, narrowing the gap, as they gaze at the alternate vessel. Buttercup plunges into the sea, beginning to swim away, and Vizzini shrieks as Buttercup, still close to the yacht, transitions from a crawl to a noiseless breaststroke. The breeze ceases, and as it does, something novel is perceived; Buttercup halts abruptly and treads water, still not distant from the vessel, remaining silent, and she's courageous. Behind her now, something shadowy and enormous glides past, and though she's frightened, terrified—who wouldn't be—she makes no response, and now a screeching eel has targeted her, and she perceives it a short distance away, circling, beginning to close. Buttercup is motionless, attempting not to make a motion of any sort as the eel glides nearer and nearer, and Buttercup understands now there's nothing she can accomplish, it's ended, all ended, and now the eel opens its maw wide, making a sound it's never made previously, as its massive jaws are about to clamp down.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Waves of people kneeling are seen as Buttercup, deeply moved, stands motionless, blinking back tears as her beauty is admired. She rides through a quiet, deserted area but stops when she encounters three men near the Florin Channel. The men are unusual: Vizzini, a Sicilian with an angelic face, stands with a Spaniard named Inigo, and a giant, Fezzik. As dusk falls, Inigo readies a sailboat, while Fezzik carries the unconscious Buttercup aboard. Vizzini tears fabric from an army jacket and tucks it along Buttercup's saddle, and with precision, the horse is sent off. Vizzini boards the boat, angry, while Inigo and Fezzik prepare to sail. As they depart, their voices fade with the boat's distance; Inigo steers, Fezzik stands by Buttercup, whose eyelids flutter faintly. Vizzini sits as waves rise and the moon occasionally peeks through clouds. Suddenly, they see another sailboat gaining on them. Buttercup dives into the water, switching from a crawl to a breaststroke, and Vizzini screams. She pauses to tread water, fearless, until a shrieking eel approaches. Though petrified, she remains still as the eel circles closer, its jaws ready to clamp down.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Waves of kneeling people are seen, and Buttercup, deeply moved, stands among them, holding back tears as her beauty is admired. She rides her horse through a quiet area but stops upon seeing three men: Vizzini, a Sicilian with an angelic face; a Spaniard, Inigo; and a giant, Fezzik. As she falls, a sailboat is ready at dusk, and Inigo prepares it while Fezzik carries Buttercup aboard. Vizzini leaves fabric on Buttercup's horse saddle with precision, and they depart. Vizzini furiously boards the boat, leaving Inigo and Fezzik. Sailing away, Inigo steers while Fezzik stands by Buttercup, whose eyelids flutter. Vizzini watches the princess and the receding shore. The moon reveals a pursuing sailboat as the wind whistles ominously. Buttercup dives, swimming silently, while Vizzini screams. A shrieking eel approaches her, but she remains still, knowing it's over, as the eel opens its jaws wide.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: A vast, undulating sea of people kneeling is clearly visible, and Buttercup, deeply and profoundly moved, remains perfectly still, standing amid her dedicated subjects. Her emotions are intense as she blinks back tears, her beauty lingering in the moment's spotlight. Buttercup then charges forward, skillfully steering her horse through a beautiful, serene, and deserted area, but she abruptly pulls the reins as she encounters a trio of men standing closely together in the path. Beyond them, the waters of Florin Channel shimmer in the distance. These three men are far from ordinary commuters; at the forefront is a diminutive man with the most angelic visage. He hails from Sicily, and his name is Vizzini. Accompanying him is a Spaniard, standing erect and sharp as a blade of steel, and next to him is a massive giant. As Buttercup begins to lose consciousness, she notices a sailboat moored nearby. It is now dusk, with elongated shadows stretching across the scene as Inigo, the diligent Spaniard, prepares the boat for departure, while the giant Fezzik gently lifts the unconscious Buttercup onboard. Meanwhile, Vizzini meticulously tears small pieces of fabric from an army jacket and discreetly tucks them around Buttercup's saddle. A remarkable skill and precision permeate the entire operation as the horse gallops away and they head towards the waiting boat. Vizzini, in a whirlwind of anger, leaps onto the boat, while Inigo and Fezzik watch him advancing on them only to glare at them, turn swiftly, and leave them behind. During this tense exchange, Inigo discreetly moves closer to Fezzik, who is visibly troubled by the harsh words he has just endured. As the boat sails away, their voices echo in the distance, with Inigo manning the helm and Fezzik standing near the princess's still form, her eyelids fluttering ever so slightly—or are they? Vizzini remains seated motionless as the waves rise higher and the moon occasionally casts slanted flashes of light through the drifting clouds. Inigo gives a nod, casting a glance back as Vizzini directs a cold gaze at the Princess while continuing to peer behind them. Suddenly, all three of them whirl around and stare intently back. It is difficult to discern at first, for the moon has retreated behind the clouds, the wind howls, and the waves crash menacingly, shrouding the scene in ominousness. Inigo, Fezzik, and Vizzini strain their eyes, trying desperately to see, holding their breaths as the tension mounts. Then, as the moon slips through the clouds, Inigo's suspicions are confirmed—another sailboat is indeed there, trailing a considerable distance behind them but rapidly gaining, closing the gap as they fix their gaze on the approaching vessel. Suddenly, Buttercup dives into the water, determinedly swimming away, prompting Vizzini to scream in frustration. Buttercup, still near the boat, gracefully transitions from a crawl to a silent breaststroke. With the wind subsiding, a new sound emerges; Buttercup abruptly halts and treads water, remaining close to the boat in silence, demonstrating remarkable courage. Behind her, something dark and enormous slithers past, and despite her terror—understandably so—she remains silent, now aware that a shrieking eel has honed in on her location. She spots it a short distance away, circling, drawing ever nearer. Buttercup is paralyzed with fear, desperately trying to remain motionless as the eel approaches, inching closer and closer. She realizes with resignation that she is powerless, her situation seemingly hopeless, as the eel opens its cavernous mouth wide, emitting a sound it has never made before, preparing to clamp down its massive jaws with finality.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: A vast and undulating sea of kneeling people stretches out before her, clearly visible in all its grandeur. Buttercup, deeply and profoundly moved by the sight, remains perfectly still, standing amid her dedicated and loyal subjects. Her emotions are intense and overwhelming as she blinks back tears, her beauty lingering in the spotlight of this profound moment. Buttercup then charges forward with determination, skillfully steering her horse through a beautifully serene and deserted area. However, she abruptly pulls the reins, bringing her horse to a sudden halt when she encounters a trio of men standing closely together in her path. Beyond them, the waters of Florin Channel shimmer mysteriously in the distance. These three men are far from being ordinary commuters; at the forefront is a diminutive man with the most angelic visage one could imagine. He hails from the storied land of Sicily, and his name is Vizzini. Accompanying him is a Spaniard, standing erect and sharp as a finely honed blade of steel, and next to him is a massive and imposing giant. As Buttercup begins to lose consciousness, she notices a sailboat conveniently moored nearby. It is now dusk, with elongated shadows stretching dramatically across the scene as Inigo, the diligent and precise Spaniard, prepares the boat for departure. Meanwhile, the giant Fezzik gently lifts the unconscious Buttercup onboard. Meanwhile, Vizzini meticulously tears small pieces of fabric from an army jacket and discreetly tucks them around Buttercup's saddle with painstaking care. A remarkable level of skill and precision permeates the entire operation as the horse gallops away, allowing them to head towards the waiting boat. Vizzini, in a whirlwind of anger, leaps onto the boat with fervor, while Inigo and Fezzik watch him advancing on them only to glare intensely, turn swiftly, and leave them behind. During this tense exchange, Inigo discreetly moves closer to Fezzik, who is visibly troubled by the harsh words he has just endured. As the boat sails away, their voices echo in the distance, with Inigo manning the helm and Fezzik standing near the princess's still form. Her eyelids flutter ever so slightly—or are they? Vizzini remains seated motionless as the waves rise higher, and the moon occasionally casts slanted flashes of light through the drifting clouds. Inigo gives a nod, casting a glance back as Vizzini directs a cold and calculating gaze at the Princess while continuing to peer behind them. Suddenly, all three of them whirl around altogether and stare intently back. It is difficult to discern at first, for the moon has retreated behind the clouds, the wind howls ferociously, and the waves crash menacingly, shrouding the scene in ominousness. Inigo, Fezzik, and Vizzini strain their eyes, trying desperately to see, holding their breaths as the tension mounts. Then, as the moon slips through the clouds, Inigo's suspicions are confirmed—another sailboat is indeed there, trailing a considerable distance behind them but rapidly gaining, closing the gap as they fix their gaze on the approaching vessel. In a sudden, unexpected move, Buttercup dives into the water, determinedly swimming away, prompting Vizzini to scream in utter frustration. Buttercup, still near the boat, gracefully transitions from a crawl to a silent breaststroke. With the wind subsiding, a new sound emerges; Buttercup abruptly halts and treads water, remaining close to the boat in silence, demonstrating remarkable courage. Behind her, something dark and enormous slithers past, and despite her terror—understandably so—she remains silent, now acutely aware that a shrieking eel has honed in on her location. She spots it a short distance away, circling, drawing ever nearer. Buttercup is paralyzed with fear, desperately trying to remain motionless as the eel approaches, inching closer and closer. She realizes with resignation that she is powerless, her situation seemingly hopeless, as the eel opens its cavernous mouth wide. It emits a sound it has never made before, preparing to clamp down its massive jaws with finality.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As great waves of people kneel in unison, Buttercup finds herself deeply moved, standing immobile among her subjects with tears forming in her eyes, while her beauty captivates everyone around her for a fleeting moment. She then rides her horse with confidence through a lovely, quiet, deserted area until she suddenly pulls back on the reins, halting her horse abruptly upon encountering three men standing closely together on the path ahead, beyond whom the waters of Florin Channel can be seen shimmering in the distance. These men are no ordinary commuters: at the forefront is Vizzini, a tiny man with a cherubic face hailing from Sicily. Beside him stands Inigo, a Spaniard with a posture as straight and poised as a blade of steel, and next to him is a giant named Fezzik. As Buttercup begins to lose consciousness and fall, a nearby sailboat is moored, its form silhouetted against the dusk with long shadows stretching across the water. Inigo busies himself with preparations for the boat's departure while Fezzik effortlessly carries Buttercup's limp body onboard. Meanwhile, Vizzini carefully rips small pieces of fabric from an army jacket and meticulously tucks them along the saddle of Buttercup’s horse with an air of decisive skill and precision, then watches as the horse gallops away. Following this, Vizzini leaps onto the boat in a fit of anger, advancing on Inigo and Fezzik, who stand by silently as he glares at them with disdain before abruptly turning away. During this tense moment, Inigo moves close to Fezzik, who is visibly upset by the harsh words he has just endured. As the boat sails off into the distance, the diminished sounds of conversation fade, leaving Inigo at the helm while Fezzik stands near Buttercup, whose eyelids flutter slightly—though it’s unclear if this is truly happening. Vizzini sits motionless as the swells grow larger, the moon intermittently casting slanted beams of light between gathering clouds. Inigo nods thoughtfully, casting a glance back toward Vizzini, who turns a cold gaze upon Buttercup, then redirects his focus behind them. Suddenly, all three turn and fix their stares on the horizon, struggling to see as the moon retreats behind the clouds, leaving the scene bathed in an ominous darkness where the wind howls and the waves crash relentlessly. In unison, Inigo, Fezzik, and Vizzini squint into the distance, desperately holding their breath to discern what lies beyond. As the moon reemerges, casting light upon the scene, Inigo’s suspicions are confirmed—a sailboat is gaining rapidly, closing the distance between them as they watch intently. In a sudden desperate move, Buttercup dives into the water, attempting to swim away from the pursuing boat. Vizzini's scream pierces the air as Buttercup remains close to their vessel, switching from an energetic crawl stroke to a quieter breaststroke. With the wind subsiding, a new sound becomes audible; Buttercup halts abruptly, treading water silently, not far from the boat, demonstrating her courageous resolve. Behind her, a dark, massive form moves with a slithering motion, and though fear grips her, she remains silent. The shrieking eel, having locked onto her, comes into view, circling ominously, drawing nearer. Buttercup is paralyzed with fear, resisting any impulse to move as the eel inches closer and closer, understanding that her situation seems dire and inescapable. The eel, with its mouth gaping wider than ever before, emits an unprecedented noise, preparing to strike with its powerful jaws poised to clench down.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: A vast gathering of kneeling people is observed, and Buttercup, deeply moved, stands among her subjects, holding back tears as her beauty is admired. She expertly rides her horse through a serene, deserted area until she suddenly reins in upon encountering three unusual men near Florin Channel: Vizzini, the Sicilian with an angelic face, the Spaniard Inigo, and the giant Fezzik. At dusk, with shadows lengthening, Inigo prepares a sailboat while Fezzik carries an unconscious Buttercup on board. Vizzini strategically tears fabric from an army jacket to leave a trail on Buttercup’s horse, showcasing tremendous skill and precision as it departs. Vizzini boards the boat angrily, confronting Inigo and Fezzik before leaving them to reflect on his insults. As they sail, Inigo mans the helm and Fezzik stands by Buttercup, whose eyelids flutter slightly. Vizzini remains still as moonlight occasionally breaks through the clouds. Suddenly, they notice another sailboat rapidly approaching under ominous skies. In a daring move, Buttercup dives into the water and swims away while Vizzini shouts after her. The wind subsides, revealing an eerie new sound. As Buttercup treads water, a shrieking eel menacingly approaches her, its jaws wide open and ready to strike, leaving her frozen in fear with no escape.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Buttercup dives into the water starting to swim away and Vizzini screams as Buttercup still close to the boat switches from a crawl to a silent breaststroke. The wind dies and as it does something new is heard. Buttercup stops suddenly and treads water still not far from the boat staying silent and she is gutsy. Behind her now something dark and gigantic slithers past and though she is scared petrified—who would not be—she makes no reply and now a shrieking eel has zeroed in on her and she sees it a short distance away circling starting to close. Buttercup is frozen trying not to make a movement of any kind as the eel slithers closer and closer and Buttercup knows. now there is nothing she can do. it is over all over and now the eel opens its mouth wide making a noise. it is never made before as its great jaws are about to clamp down.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Great waves of people kneeling are observed and Buttercup terribly moved stands immobile among her subjects blinking back tears as her beauty is held on. for a moment. Buttercup barrels along controlling her horse easily through a lovely quiet deserted area but suddenly reins in as she encounters three men standing close together in the path beyond whom can be seen the waters of Florin Channel. The three men are not your everyday commuter types. standing in front is a tiny man with the most angelic face. he is Sicilian and his name is Vizzini. Beside him is a Spaniard erect and taut as a blade of steel and beside him is a giant. As she starts to fall a sailboat is moored and it is dusk now with shadows long as Inigo the Spaniard busies himself getting the boat ready. while the giant Fezzik carries Buttercup unconscious on board. Vizzini rips some tiny pieces of fabric from an army jacket and tucks them along the saddle of Buttercup's horse and there is about the entire operation a sense of tremendous skill and precision as the horse takes off and they start for the boat. Vizzini hops onto the boat in a fury as Inigo and Fezzik stand as Vizzini advances on them and then glares at him turns and leaves them. During this Inigo has gone close to Fezzik who is very distressed at the insults he is just received. As they sail off their voices are heard as the boat recedes. Inigo is at the helm. Fezzik stands near the body of the princess whose eyelids flutter slightly—or do they. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Vizzini sits motionless as the waves are higher and there are only occasional flashes of moon slanting down between clouds. Inigo nods glancing back as Vizzini turns a cold eye on the Princess and keeps staring behind them. Suddenly the three whirl and stare back and as they do it is hard to see. the moon is behind clouds now but the wind whistles and the waves pound and suddenly it is all gone ominous. Inigo Fezzik and Vizzini squint back trying desperately to see and at this moment they are all holding their breaths. Then the moon slips through and Inigo was right—something is very much there—a sailboat. It is a good distance behind them but coming fast closing the gap as they stare at the other boat. Buttercup dives into the water starting to swim away and Vizzini screams as Buttercup still close to the boat switches from a crawl to a silent breaststroke. The wind dies and as it does something new is heard. Buttercup stops suddenly and treads water still not far from the boat staying silent and she is gutsy. Behind her now something dark and gigantic slithers past and though she is scared petrified—who would not be—she makes no reply and now a shrieking eel has zeroed in on her and she sees it a short distance away circling starting to close. Buttercup is frozen trying not to make a movement of any kind as the eel slithers closer and closer and Buttercup knows. now there is nothing she can do. it is over all over and now the eel opens its mouth wide making a noise. it is never made before as its great jaws are about to clamp down.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Immense flocks of birds soaring are spotted, and Moonbeam, utterly perplexed, stands transfixed among her pastries, giggling quietly as her reflection is held in place for an instant. Moonbeam glides forward, steering her bicycle effortlessly through a bustling, lively, populated area, but abruptly halts as she stumbles upon three turtles lounging separately on the beach, beyond whom can be glimpsed the trees of Willow Grove. The three turtles are not your everyday gardening tools; reclining nearby is a giant creature with the most demonic grin, it is Martian, and its nickname is Razzle. Adjacent to it is a cactus, drooping and flexible like a rubber band, and aside from it is a dragonfly. As she starts to float, a spaceship is grounded, and it's dawn now, with shadows short, as Indigo, the cactus, engrosses itself preparing the orbiter, while the dragonfly Fizzle hauls Moonbeam, dreaming, on board. Razzle strips some large chunks of metal from a pirate ship and wedges them along the wheels of Moonbeam's bicycle, and there is about the entire undertaking a hint of clumsy artistry and speed as the bicycle speeds off and they begin for the spaceship. Razzle leaps onto the orbiter, in a frenzy, as Indigo and Fizzle sit while Razzle approaches them and then glances at him, turns, and vanishes. Throughout this, Indigo has moved near Fizzle, who is very relieved at the compliments he's just received. As they glide away, their songs are heard as the orbiter advances; Indigo is at the oars, Fizzle rests beside the artifact of the queen, whose eyelids flutter quickly—or do they? Razzle remains stoic as the breezes become gentler, and there are only sporadic glimpses of lightning shooting up between boulders. Indigo shakes his head, peering back as Razzle fixes a gentle gaze on the Queen and keeps observing ahead of them. Suddenly the trio spins and observes forward, and as they do, it's difficult to perceive; the lightning is behind boulders now, but the air howls and the breezes ripple, and suddenly it's all become serene. Indigo, Fizzle, and Razzle blink forward, attempting frantically to hear, and at this juncture, they are all holding their laughter. Then, the lightning bursts through, and Indigo was correct—something is indeed there—a helicopter. It's a vast expanse ahead but lowering gradually, shortening the distance, as they survey the new helicopter. Moonbeam leaps onto the sand, beginning to jog away, and Razzle whispers as Moonbeam, still near the orbiter, transitions from a leap to a sudden stop. The air stagnates, and as it does, something strange is felt; Moonbeam halts suddenly and tiptoes, still quite near to the orbiter, staying quiet, and she's bold. Behind her now, something tiny and ancient rolls past, and though she's baffled, bewildered—who wouldn't be—she makes no adjustment, and now a roaring rabbit has focused in on her, and she sights it a lengthy measure away, bouncing, starting to stop. Moonbeam is stunned, trying not to initiate a movement of any order as the rabbit rolls nearer and nearer, and Moonbeam understands now there's nothing she can attempt, it's futile, all pointless, and now the rabbit shuts its eyes tight, making a gesture it's rarely made before, as its great wings are about to unfurl.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Great waves of people kneel, deeply moving Buttercup, who stands immobile among her subjects. She rides her horse through a quiet area and suddenly encounters three men beside Florin Channel: Vizzini, a tiny Sicilian with an angelic face; Inigo, a taut Spaniard; and Fezzik, a giant. As Buttercup falls unconscious, Fezzik carries her to a sailboat while Vizzini leaves clues on her horse's saddle. The trio sails off, with Vizzini visibly tense. Inigo and Fezzik hear voices over the water as they set sail. Moonlight reveals another sailboat pursuing them, alarming the trio. Buttercup dives into the water to escape, switching to a silent breaststroke. The wind dies down, and a dark, gigantic shape appears behind her—a shrieking eel. Petrified, Buttercup remains still as the eel circles closer, its jaws about to clamp down.
